Properties Methods Events Config Options Direct Link

Class Ext.ux.Reorderer

Package:Ext.ux
Defined In:Reorderer.js
Class:Reorderer
Subclasses:HBoxReorderer, ToolbarReorderer
Extends:Object
Generic base class for handling reordering of items. This base class must be extended to provide the actual reordering functionality - the base class just sets up events and abstract logic functions. It will fire events and set defaults, deferring the actual reordering to a doReorder implementation. See Ext.ux.TabReorderer for an example.

 reorder( Object mappings ) : void
Reorders the items in the target component according to the given mapping object. Example: this.reorder({ 1: 5, 3: 2 ...
Reorders the items in the target component according to the given mapping object. Example: this.reorder({ 1: 5, 3: 2 }); Would move the item at index 1 to index 5, and the item at index 3 to index 2
Parameters:
  • mappings : Object
    Object containing current item index as key and new index as property
Returns:
  • void
Reorderer

EventDefined By
 before-reorder : ( Object mappings, Mixed component, Ext.ux.TabReorderer this )
Fires before a reorder occurs. Return false to cancel
Fires before a reorder occurs. Return false to cancel
Listeners will be called with the following arguments:
  • mappings : Object
    Mappings of the old item indexes to new item indexes
  • component : Mixed
    The target component

    The plugin instance
